actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating October 7 to 13, 1973, as "Newspaper Week" and also designating October 13, 1973, as "Newspaper Carrier Day".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating October 7-13, 1973, as "Newspaper Week" and designates October 13, 1973, as "Newspaper Carrier Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating October 7 to 13, 1973, as "Newspaper Week" and also designating October 13, 1973, as "Newspaper Carrier Day".
